thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great stay
thread.title_full: A great stay - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Nigel H
title: A great stay
text: Very pleased with this stay, the first time we have used a Premier Inn. Very central location with lots of tourist destinations within walking distance. Do take advantage of their meal deal which includes a two course dinner and an "all you can eat" fabulous breakfast and is a real bargain. However, the coffee is awful and best avoided. The restaurant on the lower ground floor is pleasant and the staff throughout the hotel are professional and efficient. Highly recommended.
